home.sealant_desc: Provides excellent sealing, waterproof and dustproof performance, suitable for construction, automotive and electronic fields.
home.ab_glue_desc: High-strength, fast-curing structural adhesive for bonding various materials such as metal, plastic, and ceramics.
home.glue_502_desc: Instant strong bonding, widely used for rapid fixing in household repairs, handicraft making and industrial production.
home.tape_desc: Excellent insulation and flame retardancy, providing reliable safety protection for electrical operations.
home.why_choose_us_text: We are more than just a glue supplier, we are your reliable partner. We have a deep understanding of your industry needs, provide tailor-made solutions to help you improve production efficiency, reduce costs, and stand out in the fierce market competition.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are more than just glue manufacturers; we are your partners in innovation.
about.mission_text: To help our customers succeed by providing superior adhesive technology and unparalleled customer service. We are committed to continuous innovation to provide reliable, efficient, and environmentally friendly solutions for various industrial applications.
about.history_2005_text: In a small garage, we began our exploration of high-performance adhesives.
about.history_2010_text: Successfully developed the first epoxy resin adhesive with independent intellectual property rights.
about.history_2018_text: Expanded production scale and introduced fully automated production lines.
about.history_2023_text: Our products are sold in more than 30 countries and regions worldwide.
